New Records: Zach LaVine scored 33 points, and Nikola Vučević had 23 points and 13 rebounds
Key Match Events: LaVine had 18 points in the first half to help Chicago take control
Josh Giddey answered with a pair of layups to kick off a 15-4 run
The Bulls made nine of their 16 3-point tries in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Ayo Dosunmu worked out before the game but missed his eighth straight with a calf strain
Jordan Poole was a game-time decision but looked sharp early on
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls evened a 125-107 loss to the Wizards on Jan. 1
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls got its fifth win in seven games
Others: The Bulls spotted their guests the opening basket but took the lead for good a few possessions later
Chicago didn’t much miss the burst of speed they get at both ends from G Ayo Dosunmu against the lowly Wizards
